title: Connection lag ever since new client update
body: Ever since I installed the new client I get super high ping spikes from 60 ping to 200-300 ping. Is this only me and the lag is on my end or is it server side?

replies.body: same, use to having 25ping today its goes from 60- 200 then i reach the fight and im bouncing between 114-300

Those pings spikes may not be any fault on either end. The internet can be preeeeetty weird sometimes, and it sounds like your connection might be running into some hiccups here and there before it reaches our servers. Check out the steps [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to at least narrow down the main issue. Hit me back if you're still having those ping spikes!
